message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1200000. This is a fair price, considering its value to you. Let me know what you think.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. However, I am only able to pay up to $1100000 for it. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.

Bob, I appreciate your counteroffer. While I value your interest, I can't accept $1100000.  The product is worth more than that. I'm willing to come down to $1150000. This is a fair price that allows us both to benefit from the deal.  Let me know if you're interested.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I understand your position, but I must stick to my budget. I am willing to pay $1125000 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. However, $1125000 is still below the true value of the product.  I'm willing to compromise further and come down to $1140000. This is my final offer, and it reflects the fair value of the product. Let me know if we can reach an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts to meet my budget, Alice. After careful consideration, I am willing to pay $1137500 for the product. I hope this revised offer is acceptable.
